short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BetterNaifuYTG enhances YouTube Live Chat with more emotes (Twitch, BTTV, FFZ Emotes), new features, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube live stream extension to improve viewer engagement and experience. Emote library and chat utilities updated to December 2024 emote meta. 

-4500+ emote library.
-Custom Chat for YT Premiers, Live Streams, VODs, and Offline chats.
-Global BTTV/FFZ/Twitch emotes.
-Better Naifu custom emotes.
-Emote Dictionary/Library (Found at bottom of Options menu).
-Display your Pop-out chat as "Window Capture" on OBS (Transparency through Effect Filters > Key Color Types.)

-Disable/Enable User badges in front of username.
-Disable/Enable YT avatar in chat.
-Disable/Enable Moving Member Badges in front of Username.
-Disable/Enable Chat Username Colors.
-Disable/Enable Live Chat by default.


-Press, "Tab" to auto-complete emote names. Previews included.
-Stackable Zero-Width/Stylized emotes 
-Emote previews by pressing the Tab button.
-Refresh button for chat. (If you encounter bugs, this should help.)
-Blacklist/Hide Messages, and Emotes based on keywords.
-Highlight function to highlight certain keywords.
-Hide/Unhide non-members in chat (only your perspective.)
-Hover over emotes to know their name.
-Better Naifu Emotes are now visible in super chat (but not on OBS.)

Recommended Extension Add-ons:

YouTube Comment Custom CSS Tester:
Custom CSS on pop-up chat for streams as you would with the Chat v2.0 Style Generator.
https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/youtube-comment-custom-cs/jamdfahhlffjdnmfmjmakbinalkhahjm

YouTube Livestreams Theater Mode:
Custom Theatre mode on YT live streams.
https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/youtube-livestreams-theat/cmjhejfkhdonjimgkinjdombabgfbcal
